title: Yvie Is Following Four Of The ‘Bachie’ Guys On IG So Watch Me Dramatically Read Into It
text:
RIGHTO, we’ve reached the top ten on The Bachelorette 2019, which means everyone (me) is about to dial up the ~ investigation ~ into every single thing Angie Kent does or does not do to figure out who she chooses. Today though, we’re looking at best mate Yvie Jones‘ Instagram account.

As picked up by the team over at news.com.au, Yvie is following four of The Bachelorette blokes on IG. That’s Carlin Sterritt, Ciarran Stott, Timm Hanley, and Ryan Anderson. I think it’s safe to say these are the favourites, which adds to the HMM factor in all of this. Sure, Yvie might just be following them ‘cos they’re mates but surely she, and Channel 10, realise what this looks like. In past seasons, the moment a family member or best friend followed a Bachie contestant on social media, rumoursville went into overdrive.

Meanwhile, Angie is only following Ryan on IG and that makes sense since they already knew each other prior to the show. If you’re a bit foggy on those details, Ryan said he had a bit of “back and forth over social media for a while” with Angie “but we never actually met in person.”

(the blokes don’t know whether to believe him or not)

But what does it all mean? I dunno. All four are top contenders, there’s just no doubting it. Would I be surprised if these four end up being Angie’s top four? Absolutely not. And based on how things are going, one of them is definitely Angie’s ~ one ~.

The Bachelorette continues tonight 7.30pm on Channel 10.

For what it’s worth, Bachie rejects Tom Bowdidge and Adam Sellars reckon Carlin is the clear frontrunner, closely followed by Timm and Ciarran. No one but Angie is much of a fan of Ryan right now.
description: Yvie Jones, Angie Kent's best mate and fellow former Gogglebox star, is casually following four of The Bachelorette boys on Instagram.
